Gameplay:

LVL1

LEFT CLICK to select an object

A to go to the left
D to go to the right
SPACEBAR to jump

LVL2

DRAG AND DROP with your mouse to move an object

A to go to the left
D to go to the right
SPACEBAR to jump

LVL3

Pass above the torches to turn them on

Don't let kakamena to touch you
A to go to the left
D to go to the right
SPACEBAR to jump

LVL4

DRAG AND DROP with your mouse and the pickaxe to move an object
